text: The men's 300 metre free rifle from three positions was a shooting sports event held as part of the shooting at the 1912 Summer Olympics programme. It was the second appearance of the event, which had been introduced in 1908. The competition was held on Tuesday, 2 July 1912. Eighty-four sport shooters from nine nations competed. ==Results== {| class=wikitable style="text- align:center" |- !
